title: No Country For Old Men
cast: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin
overview: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
overview: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.

title: Scarface
cast: Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer
overview: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

title: Predestination
cast: Ethan Hawke, Sarah Snook, Noah Taylor
overview: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

title: Ip Man 2
overview: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
cast: Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt, Bill Paxton
overview: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
overview: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: Vanilla Sky
cast: Tom Cruise, Penélope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
overview: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
cast: Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil, Sergi López
overview: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

title: The Butterfly Effect
cast: Ashton Kutcher, Amy Smart, Melora Walters
overview: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.
